Pre-Game Insights: Mehdi Taremi gained significant acclaim within the football community for his instrumental role in guiding Portuguese club Porto to last season’s league title, where he scored an impressive 22 goals – the highest in the league.
Everton Camargo (Hong Kong, China) has made a mere four appearances for his recently joined national side but has introduced an element of speed and strength to the right flank of the lineup.
There is no news of injury in the Hong Kong, China squad whereas Iran will still miss the likes of Ali Gholizadeh who is injured.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Hong Kong, China haven’t earned a win in their last six games.
Iran emerged victorious in the two sides’ previous meeting.
Total Matches – 3: Hong Kong, China wins – 0, Iran wins – 3, Draws – 0

Match Prediction for Hong Kong vs Iran: With a 90% likelihood of securing victory, Iran enter this match as the superior and more experienced side who will look to grab their second victory of the AFC Asian Cup 2023 campaign.
